column2: I haven't had any work suitable to a witcher in some time, maybe it's time to move on.
I should ask [Liege.GetTitledFirstName] first.
[From.GetFirstName], a witcher in your employment has expressed his desire to leave your court.
He can surely stay for a while longer.
Some gold will change his mind.
He can leave if he wishes to.
[liege.GetTitledFirstName] asked me to reconsider and stay for a while longer.
Very well, I can stay for a bit.
I have already decided to leave.
[liege.GetTitledFirstName] have offered me a considerable sum of gold if I continue to provide my services as a witcher.
It's not like I wanted to leave.
Few coins will not change my mind.
I will leave to...
... here.
[From.GetFirstName] will stay in your court for a while longer.
Gold can change any man's mind, [From.GetFirstName] accepted your gift and will stayin your court for a while longer.
[From.GetFirstName] has left your court to seek employment elsewhere.
Damn!
Scant Gamelands
Vampires!
A Vampire Clan has taken root in [Root.GetName] leading to severe unrest amongst the local populace.
Werewolves!
A pack of werewolves have entered [Root.Getname], they terrorise the local populace each night leading to unrest and disruption of the local economy.
Kikimora Infestation
A large number of Kikimoras settled in the swamps near [Root.GetName].
Hellhounds Infestation
Hellhounds are haunting the countryside near [Root.GetName].
Rotfiend Infestation
A large number of Rotfiends appeared near [Root.GetName].
